text:
Uneasy Conversations

Tension fills the room; Pulcheria fidgets nervously.  
Pulcheria: “Who caused more misery, him or her?”  
Razumihin: “Raskolnikov intentionally insulted Luzhin.”  
Pulcheria: “I think so, too.”  

---

Pulcheria glances at Dounia, seeking reassurance.  
Pulcheria: “What’s your opinion of Luzhin?”  
Razumihin: “I respect your daughter’s choice, truly.”  
Avdotya: “You were rude last night.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pulcheria Alexandrovna expresses her concern about the potential misery between her daughter Dounia and her fiancé Pyotr Petrovitch, while Razumihin reflects on Raskolnikov's intentional insult towards him.
